subsection_analysis.refined_text: Interactive forms: These contain fields that you can select and fill in . Use the interactive forms to test your knowledge of stories you saw on CNN iReport .
A government agency creates a form with a form to remain certified . The form is required to be certified by a government agency to be a certified document .
Interactive fillable fillable forms can be filled only by hand . Or they intentionally design a form that you can fill in only by using only your hand .

CNN.com will feature iReporter photos in a weekly Travel Snapshots gallery . Please submit your best shots for next week's gallery . Submit your photos to CNN iReport next week . Visit CNNimages.com/Travel next Wednesday for a new gallery of snapshots .

Fill in interactive forms to fill up interactive forms . Fill in the interactive forms at the bottom of the interactive map . Visit the interactive form to find out more about how to fill in the form .
